    HpoOnsetDistribution.isObservableInAge(HpoDisease disease, PointInTime age)
    This method can be used to determine whether a patient (as represented in a Phenopacket, for example) has come to medical attention at an age that corresponds to what we expect for a disease.

    HpoOnsetDistribution.probabilityOfPresentationAtAge(HpoDisease disease, TemporalInterval interval)
    This method can return a probability of a patient presenting at the indicated age if the patient has the disease.
